name: GreedGems
title: Greed
rules: ԍGems

name: GreedJewelry
title: Greed
rules: ԍJewelry

name: GreedPearls
title: Greed
rules: ԍPearls

name: GreedTrinkets
title: Greed
rules: ԍTrinkets

name: GreedCoins
title: Greed
rules: ԍCoins

name: GreedHate
title: Captain Freaks Out!
rules: The game ends now. Someone gets shot.

name: GreedApathy
title: Loading the Gun!
rules: The game ends after one more round. Someone gets shot.

name: GreedLike
title: Captain fell asleep?!
rules: The game ends now. No-one gets shot.

name: Admire
title: Admire
rule1of3: If yours is the only worker on this card, Gain 2 treasures.
rule2of3: If yours is the only worker on this card, Swap 2 treasures.
rule3of3: If yours is the only worker on this card, Lose 2 treasures.

name: Bribe
title: Bribe
rules: Lose a coin, Gain a treasure.

name: Cajole
title: Cajole
rule1of3: Lose a treasure, gain a coin.

name: Decieve
title: Decieve
rules: Take a treasure from a player. Give them a treasure.

name: Entertain
title: Entertain
rules: Gain 1 treasure per worker already on this card.

name: Flirt
title: Flirt
rule2of2: Swap a treasure with one in the Captain's Greed.

name: Gripe
title: Gripe
rule1of3: Lose a coin, Gain a treasure.
rule2of3: Gain a coin, Swap a treasure with one in the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: Add a treasure from your loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: Hoodwink
title: Hoodwink
rule1of3: Gain a coin, Gain a treasure.
rule2of3: Lose a coin, Gain a treasure from the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: Gain a coin, Add a treasure from your loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: Kowtow
title: Kowtow
rules: Lose 1 or 3 treasures.

name: Lie
title: Lie
rules: Add or Remove a Captain meeple then take another turn.

name: Menace
title: Menace
rules: Take a treasure from another player.

name: Negotiate
title: Negotiate
rule1of2: Choose a player. Trade a treasure with that player.
rule2of2: Give a player a coin. Move that player's worker. Take another turn.

name: Orate
title: Orate
rule2of3: Add a treasure from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: Quibble
title: Quibble
rules: Swap a treasure with the Captain.

name: Rage
title: Rage
rules: Lose 2 treasures per empty slot on this card.

name: Steal
title: Steal
rules: Take two coins from another player.

name: Trick
title: Trick
rules: Take a treasure from another player. Give that player a coin.

name: Whine
title: Whine
rule1of3: Add a treasure from your loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: Yell
title: Yell
rule1of3: Add a treasure from your loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule2of3: Add a treasure from a player's loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: Add a treasure from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: c1
rules: When you Lose a treasure, you may place it into the Captain's greed.
title: Trevyn

name: c2
rules: When you Gain coins, Gain an extra coin.
title: Sophia

name: c3
rules: You are treated as having one more treasure of your choice for scoring purposes (but not getting shot).
title: Andrew

name: c5
rules: When you swap treasures with the captain you may swap 1 additional treasure.
title: Erin

name: c9
rules: Instead of taking a treasure, you may swap a treasure with the Captain's greed.
title: Dan

name: c11
rules: If you have the most coins at the end of the game, gain 5 extra points.
title: James

name: c12
rules: When you swap a treasure, you may pay a player 1 coin to swap a treasure with that player instead of the Captain.
title: Taylor

name: c15
rules: When you gain and lose a treasure in the same round, you may also add a treasure from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.
title: Berrett

name: c17
rules: When you count treasures for the purpose of determining who gets shot, you are treated as having 2 fewer treasures.
title: Dwayne

name: c19
rules: Your gold coins are worth 1 extra point each at the end of the game.
title: Alison
